title: My phone (Pixel 3A XL) is not detecting my charger immediately. It takes some time to recognise it.
content: My phone is taking time to recognise that I have plugged in my charger. At times it even shows that I have connected my device to a computer when it is not. Charging is slowly getting more and more difficult as phone would at times stop charging randomly
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
